short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Sell all' button to each item in the workshop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For the browser game Farm RPG.
Basically just adds a button to each item in the workshop that says 'Sell item'. Pressing it sells the entire amount of the item.
Also adjusts the look of the craft button so that both buttons fit well.
